name: The Playful Mansion of Death
description:
Both you and your friend are trapped in a cute little mansion of death. Huzzah!

You play against another player. At the start of the game, you answer a series of cute questions about yourself, and then you are on to race your opponent to finish the 4 rooms of the mansion. But beware! This is no ordinary mansion. Each room demands you guess what the other player answered to THEIR questions. If you guess right, lucky you, the room is cleared automatically, but if not... Prepare for hell. 

Come play in a colorful mansion filled with happy surprises, including spiked cheese traps, murderous unicorns, and arrows of demise and love.
